name: Machineboy Complete Collection
description:
Machineboy Complete Bundle!
Looking for adventure and want the best bang for your buck, or just want the complete collection?

Get both the charming, award-winning adventure Milkmaid of the Milky Way together with heartwarming Northern Norwegian adventure Embracelet - complete with both soundtracks and save!

Embracelet is an adventure game set in Northern Norway - a unique coming of age story about love, loss, friendship and family - and a magical bracelet with mysterious powers!

Milkmaid of the Milky Way is an award-winning point-and-click adventure game in rhyme that combines a gripping story with puzzles and exploration. What happens when a young milkmaid sees an alien craft in a fjord in 1920's Norway?

Both soundtracks are chill, laid back scores with 49 tracks combined.

Machineboy is one-man-team Mattis Folkestad from Oslo, Norway.
